trans-unit.source: Represents an easing function that creates an animation that accelerates and/or decelerates using the formula *f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>p</sup> where p is equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power*> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma função easing que cria uma animação que acelera e/ou decelerates utilizando a fórmula *f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>p</sup> onde p é igual do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power*>

trans-unit.source: You can control whether the animation accelerates, decelerates, or both by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pode controlar se a animação acelera, decelerates, ou ambos, especificando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following graph demonstrates the different values of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time.
trans-unit.target: O gráfico seguinte demonstra os valores diferentes de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, onde *f*(*t*) representa o progresso de animação e *t* representa tempo.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![CubicEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/cubicease-graph.png "CubicEase EasingMode graphs.")
trans-unit.target: ![CubicEase EasingMode gráficos. ] (~/add/media/cubicease-graph.png "CubicEase EasingMode gráficos.")

trans-unit.source: By using the PowerEase function, you can specify how quickly acceleration/deceleration takes place by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power%2A> property: *f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>p</sup> where `p` is equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ao utilizar a função de PowerEase, pode especificar a rapidez aceleração/deceleration ocorre especificando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power%2A>propriedade: *f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>p</sup> onde `p` é igual do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the PowerEase function can be substituted for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuadraticEase> (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>2</sup>), <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CubicEase> (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>3</sup>), <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuarticEase> (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>4</sup>), and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuinticEase> (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>5</sup>).
trans-unit.target: Because of this, the PowerEase function can be substituted for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuadraticEase> (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>2</sup>), <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CubicEase> (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>3</sup>), <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuarticEase> (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>4</sup>), and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuinticEase> (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>5</sup>).</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuinticEase></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuarticEase></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.CubicEase></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuadraticEase>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you wanted to use a PowerEase function to create the same behavior as a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuadraticEase> function (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>2</sup>), you would specify a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power%2A> property value of 2.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se pretendesse utilizar uma função de PowerEase para criar o mesmo comportamento de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuadraticEase>função (*f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>2</sup>), tem de especificar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power%2A>valor da propriedade de 2.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuadraticEase>

trans-unit.source: There are several other easing functions besides PowerEase which you can explore using the following Silverlight sample.
trans-unit.target: Existem várias outras funções easing além PowerEase que pode explorar utilizando o exemplo seguinte do Silverlight.

trans-unit.source: [Run this sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery) In addition to using the easing functions included in the run-time, you can create your own custom easing functions by inheriting from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>.
trans-unit.target: [Executar este exemplo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery) além de utilizar as funções easing incluídas no tempo de execução, pode criar as suas próprias funções easing personalizadas ao herdar de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de elemento do objeto de XAML``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> derived class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref> classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When creating a derived class, you must override this method.
trans-unit.target: Ao criar uma classe derivada, tem de substituir este método.

trans-unit.source: Animation classes inherit indirectly from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.
trans-unit.target: Classes de animação herdarem indiretamente <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you need to override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method to construct a custom animation object.
trans-unit.target: Por este motivo, terá de substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>método para construir um objeto de animação personalizada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: A nova instância.

trans-unit.source: Provides the logic portion of the easing function that you can override to produce the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode"></xref> mode of the custom easing function.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a parte da lógica da função easing que pode substituir para produzir o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode"> </xref> modo da função easing personalizado.

trans-unit.source: This method transforms normalized time to control the pace of an animation for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> case of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método transforma normalizado tempo para controlar o ritmo de um animação para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>caso de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>

trans-unit.source: You only have to specify your easing function for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> case because the implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> method transforms `normalizedTime` for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> cases.
trans-unit.target: Só tem de especificar a sua função easing para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>caso porque a implementação do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A>transformações de método `normalizedTime` para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>casos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>

trans-unit.source: Normalized time (progress) of the animation.
trans-unit.target: Hora (progresso) normalizada da animação.

trans-unit.source: A double that represents the transformed progress.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de duplo que representa o progresso transformado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the exponential power of the animation interpolation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a potência exponencial de interpolação a animação.

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of 7 will create an animation interpolation curve that follows the formula *f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>7</sup>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um valor de 7 criará uma curva de interpolação animação que se segue a fórmula *f*(*t*) = *t*<sup>7</sup>.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)] ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)] # # XAML utilização de atributos ``` ```

trans-unit.source: The exponential power of the animation interpolation.
trans-unit.target: A potência exponencial de interpolação a animação.

trans-unit.source: This value must be greater or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: Este valor tem de ser maior ou igual a 0.

trans-unit.source: The default is 2.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 2.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PowerEase.Power*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
